# Introduction

-   Read in and reference data source, based on [@oke2020]

```{r read-data, message=FALSE}
bg_chem <- read_csv("BGchem2008data.csv")
```

## Analysis

-   Calculate summary statistics -mean NO3 -mean NO2 -mean NH4 -mean P

```{r}
no3_mean <- mean(bg_chem$NO3)
no2_mean <- mean(bg_chem$NO2)
nh4_mean <- mean(bg_chem$NH4)
p_mean <- mean(bg_chem$P)

```

-   Calculate mean Redfield ratio

```{r}
redfield <- (no3_mean + no2_mean + nh4_mean)/p_mean
```

We calculated the Redfield ratio to be `r round(redfield, 2)`

-   Plot Redfield ratio

```{r}
plot(bg_chem$P, bg_chem$NO3 + bg_chem$NO2 + bg_chem$NH4)
```
